text: Morgan Nick is a person who was born on September 12, 1988. She was kidnapped and went missing on June 9, 1995.Timeline: A Look Into Some Of The Twists And Turns In Morgan Nick Case | 5newsonline.com == Disappearance == On June 9, 1995, Morgan and her family were at a baseball game. Around an hour later, Morgan asked her mother if she could get fireflies with her friends. Her mother did not want to allow Morgan to go at first, but agreed after other parents said that it would be safe. She was last seen getting sand out of her shoes next to her mothers vehicle.It's been 24 years since Morgan Nick disappeared from a ballpark in Alma | thv11.com Her friends reported seeing a stranger. She was never seen again. == References == Category:1988 births Category:2015 deaths N
title: Disappearance of Morgan Nick
